import React, { Component } from 'react'; const Signup = props => { let clickHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() debugger fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/v1/users', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', Accept: 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ user: { username: 'guy', password: 'hi', bio: 'King of Flavortown, USA', avatar: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/9a/Guy_Fieri_at_Guantanamo_2.jpg' } }) }) .then(r => r.json()) .then(console.log) } return (
Signup
{ debugger console.log(this.clickHandler) this.clickHandler()}}>



) } export default Signup
